description: Verses checklist with section headings visible includes heading text prepended to verse content

expectedBehavior.sectionHeadingDisplay: Section heading text appears at start of verse cell content when showSectionHeadings=true
expectedBehavior.headingFormatting: Heading text is distinguished from verse text (may have special styling/markers)
expectedBehavior.psalmSuperscriptions: Psalm superscriptions (verse 0) may be handled differently from regular section headings

cells.mayInclude: Section heading before Psalm 1 if present
Section heading before Psalm 2 if present

verificationNotes: Section heading text should appear in verse cells when showSectionHeadings=true
Heading text should be visually distinct from verse text
Psalm superscriptions in verse 0 are still excluded (verse 0 exclusion applies)
Section headings between verses should appear with the following verse
